title: Urban Watercolor Sketching: A Guide to Drawing,
description:
Felix Scheinberger, "Urban Watercolor Sketching: A Guide to Drawing, Painting, and Storytelling in Color"

ISBN: 0770435211 | 2014 | EPUB | 154 pages | 90 MB

A guide that shows painters, drawers, doodlers, and urban sketchers how to bring their drawings to life with colorful, bold, yet accessible painting methods.

COLOR YOUR LIFE

Bring new energy to your sketches of urban scenes with this fresh and simple approach to watercolor painting. Accomplished designer and illustrator Felix Scheinberger offers a solid foundation in color theory and countless lessons on all aspects of watercolor sketching, including:
